1.0.name: wordpress/undo-box
1.0.description:
Undo Box adds a simple meta box to your post editor, allowing you to quickly restore the last (auto)saved version of a post.

Reverting again restores the initial version.

Features

  • One-click revert
  • Quick link to compare current and latest revision
  • Quick link to all revisions meta box (and shows it when hidden)
